html: A week ago, when the Problem Solvers Caucus met with the President in the Situation Room, we discussed the importance of reopening the government, so we can have a constructive bipartisan conversation about immigration and border security.
text: A week ago, when the Problem Solvers Caucus met with the President in the Situation Room, we discussed the importance of reopening the government, so we can have a constructive bipartisan conversation about immigration and border security.

html: As we have for weeks, including our meeting with the President in the Situation Room, the Problem Solvers Caucus will continue to meet and develop substantive, bipartisan solutions regarding border security and immigration.
text: As we have for weeks, including our meeting with the President in the Situation Room, the Problem Solvers Caucus will continue to meet and develop substantive, bipartisan solutions regarding border security and immigration.

html: The Problem Solvers Caucus applauds both sides for agreeing to open the government and sit down at the table to find a long-term solution. We believe it’s best to engage in bipartisan, constructive conversation.
text: The Problem Solvers Caucus applauds both sides for agreeing to open the government and sit down at the table to find a long-term solution.  We believe it’s best to engage in bipartisan, constructive conversation.

html: We can't let this shutdown put a ground stop on our region's economy. Our skies are at risk and massive delays at LaGuardia and Newark airports are unacceptable. I've sent 11 bills to the Senate to reopen the government. It's time for action.
text:
We can't let this shutdown put a ground stop on our region's economy. Our skies are at risk and massive delays at LaGuardia and Newark airports are unacceptable.   

I've sent 11 bills to the Senate to reopen the government. It's time for action.

html: The FDA is in charge of inspecting roughly eighty percent of our food supply. Yet, forty-one percent of the FDA’s 17,000 employees are currently furloughed when they should be inspecting the lettuce, the cereal, the ice cream you bring into your homes every day.

html: More than one million New Jersey families deduct more than $10,000 in State and Local Taxes (SALT), which means the federal Tax Hill Bill sent NJ taxes up, especially in northern NJ. The average SALT deduction in my District is more than $24,000.

html: Like most of you, I’m sick and tired of the gridlock and obstructionism, when we have so much on the line. That’s why we are doing something about it for New Jersey and our country.
text: Like most of you, I’m sick and tired of the gridlock and obstructionism, when we have so much on the line. That’s why we are doing something about it for New Jersey and our country.

html: Again, in this era of divided government, we hope Leader Pelosi will join us in taking these concrete steps for change to help break the gridlock and pass meaningful legislation to fix health care, immigration, and infrastructure.
text: Again, in this era of divided government, we hope Leader Pelosi will join us in taking these concrete steps for change to help break the gridlock and pass meaningful legislation to fix health care, immigration, and infrastructure.

html: Most Americans would look at these proposals and tell you they're just common sense, and expect Congress to already work that way. Unfortunately, years of partisanship and ideologically-motivated obstructionism have undercut our governing institutions.
text: Most Americans would look at these proposals and tell you they're just common sense, and expect Congress to already work that way. Unfortunately, years of partisanship and ideologically-motivated obstructionism have undercut our governing institutions.

html: 3. Every Congress, each Member will be allowed to introduce one bill for debate and a vote on a committee on which he/she serves. The bill must be germane to that committee's jurisdiction and have at least one cosponsor from the other party.
text: 3. Every Congress, each Member will be allowed to introduce one bill for debate and a vote on a committee on which he/she serves. The bill must be germane to that committee's jurisdiction and have at least one cosponsor from the other party.

html: 2. When an amendment (a proposed change) to a bill has at least 20 Democratic and 20 Republican cosponsors, it will get a debate and a vote when that bill is considered on the floor.
text: 2. When an amendment (a proposed change) to a bill has at least 20 Democratic and 20 Republican cosponsors, it will get a debate and a vote when that bill is considered on the floor.

html: 1. When a bill receives 290 cosponsors (or three-fifths of Congress), it will go to the House floor for debate and a timely vote.
text: 1. When a bill receives 290 cosponsors (or three-fifths of Congress), it will go to the House floor for debate and a timely vote.

html: The bottom line is this: We need real rules reform to get bipartisan legislation heard — not just more committees to study the problem. Bipartisan legislation with broad support deserves honest debate and a simple up-or-down vote.
text: The bottom line is this: We need real rules reform to get bipartisan legislation heard — not just more committees to study the problem. Bipartisan legislation with broad support deserves honest debate and a simple up-or-down vote.

html: If we are going to get anything done and move New Jersey forward, we will have to work together. With health care, immigration, infrastructure, and jobs on the line, we simply can’t afford two more years of gridlock.
text: If we are going to get anything done and move New Jersey forward, we will have to work together. With health care, immigration, infrastructure, and jobs on the line, we simply can’t afford two more years of gridlock.

html: The reality is that we are now living in an era of divided government. Come January, Democrats will lead the House, but the Senate and White House will continue to be controlled by Republicans.
text: The reality is that we are now living in an era of divided government. Come January, Democrats will lead the House, but the Senate and White House will continue to be controlled by Republicans.

html: For six months now, the Problem Solvers has focused on changing the House rules, so we can finally get action on infrastructure (fixing our roads, tunnels and bridges), health care (premiums down), and immigration reform (allowing DREAMERs to stay and keeping our borders secure).
text: For six months now, the Problem Solvers has focused on changing the House rules, so we can finally get action on infrastructure (fixing our roads, tunnels and bridges), health care (premiums down), and immigration reform (allowing DREAMERs to stay and keeping our borders secure).

text:
It’s basically a 7% tax increase on residents across the Fifth District. 
That’s why I’m making it a top priority in the new Congress to fight to get a full reinstatement of the SALT deduction so we can eliminate the double taxation devastating our NJ families & small businesses.

html: The data couldn't be clearer: students who don't eat breakfast have a harder time focusing, make more errors, & are more likely to be absent, tardy, & to repeat a grade.
